name: Well
description: A critical utility or transit point; adventurers might sabotage, defend, or navigate the settlement through it.
atmosphere: The well has a cool, essential atmosphere with the sound of water being drawn and the scent of clean, fresh water and the echo of the bucket hitting the water below. The air carries the promise of life-sustaining water and the essential nature of this vital resource, while the atmosphere crackles with the energy of community gathering and the importance of maintaining access to clean water for the settlement's survival.
